info.name: Wikipedia ~ easy-read remix
info.description:
An elegant new look for Wikipedia, optimized for not hurting your eyes while reading *_*. Based on Readability's color scheme but also taking all the good things of these 2 cool userstyles: Wikipedia (readable, hyphenation)
Wikipedia - Layout, enhanced
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0
- Initial release

v1.1
- Fix: Spanish quotations.
- Fix: "articlefeedback" background.
- Fix: "catlink" background.
- Enhancement: Changed body typography to Sans Serif for better on-screen readability.



________________
To do
